com.jpaulmorrison.fbp.core.engine

Class Network

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • com.jpaulmorrison.fbp.core.engine.Component
        • com.jpaulmorrison.fbp.core.engine.Network
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CleanUpDEATRecords, Copy1, Copy2, CopyFileToCons, CopyTR, Deadlock, FileCopy, FileViewer, InfQueueAsMain, MergeandSort, MergeSortDrop, NoDeadlock, ScanDir, SelRecipes, SriramsTest, SubNet, Telegram, TestBalloon, TestChainsNet, TestCounter, TestDropOldest, TestFixedSizeArray, TestInfiniteQueue, TestIPCounting, TestLoadBalanceWithSubstreams, TestMixedInput, TestOptionalArray, TestSelNthItem, TestSockets, TestTune, TestTune2, TextMerge, TimingTest, TPX, TryBrowser, TryReplicate, TSS, Update, VolumeTest, VolumeTest2, VolumeTest3, WordCount, WriteReadInterpret, WriteToSocketFromJava

    public abstract class Network
extends Component
    The abstract class which all flow networks extend directly or indirectly. A specific flow network must override the define() method, which is written using the mini-language (actually just highly restricted Java invoking the protected methods of this class). The mini-language specifies what threads are to be created using which components, and what connections are established between the ports of those components.

      • putGlobal

        @Deprecated
protected java.lang.Object putGlobal(java.lang.String s,
                                                  java.lang.Object o)
        Deprecated. 
        putGlobal provides access to the private final field globals, a synchronizedMap. Use this carefully as global data creates a fat coupling.
        Overrides:
        putGlobal in class Component
        Parameters:
        s - The String key to the global field
        o - The Object value to be stored at the String key.
        Returns:
        Object containing the old entry if one is replaced, or null, if none is replaced.

      • getGlobal

        @Deprecated
protected java.lang.Object getGlobal(java.lang.String s)
        Deprecated. 
        getGlobal provides access to the private final field globals, a synchronizedMap. The specific global data required is accessed by means of a String key. Use putGlobal to update.
        Overrides:
        getGlobal in class Component
        Parameters:
        s - The String key to the global field
        Returns:
        Object containing the entry if one is found, or null, if none is found.
